data.title: City hall, mayor, stats, schools, attractions, and more
data.meta_description: Located in California, the City of Lompoc has a lot to discover. Find more about its City Hall, Mayor, Schools, Banks, Passport Facilities, and Leisure Activities.
data.text:
The City of Lompoc is located in the state of California, in Santa Barbara County. Its area, population and other key information are listed below.

For all your administrative procedures, you can go to the City hall of Lompoc at the address and schedules indicated on this page or contact the City hall government by phone or by email depending on your preference or on the service's availability.

Update data

Where is Lompoc, California ?

Lompoc lies in Santa Barbara County. Geographically, it's situated in Southern California, USA, near the Pacific Ocean. Lompoc is approximately 55 miles northwest of Santa Barbara city and about 270 miles south of San Francisco. It is close to Vandenberg Space Force Base, a notable nearby landmark.
